content: Military families are first lady’s first cause Stars and Stripes Monday, March 23, 2009 Jaime Hurley wants to see privileges adjusted for dependents like her. Petty Officer 1st Class Jerome Higgins wants more downtime between deployments. Flora Edwards says military families need better child care and more assistance at new assignments. Concerns like those may be gaining a new and prominent supporter, one who definitely has the commander-in-chief’s ear. Since her husband’s campaign, first lady Michelle Obama has spoken of making the plight of military families a focus of hers from the White House perch. Now military families and advocacy groups are waiting to see how that support will play out. "We all have some fundamental things in common," Obama told a crowd of veterans and military family members last October while campaigning at Camp Lejeune, N.C., a community that has about 60,000 Marines deployed to Iraq and Afghanistan. "We share a vision of a system that does more to support military families, both when your loved ones are deployed and long after they return." Read full article at > >http://www.stripes.com/article.asp?section=104&article=61525

Part 1:>>>http://www.politico.com/pdf/080222_MOPrincetonThesis_1-251.pdf Part 2:>>>http://www.politico.com/pdf/080222_MOPrincetonThesis_26-501.pdf Part 3:>>>>http://www.politico.com/pdf/080222_MOPrincetonThesis_51-751.pdf Part 4:>>>>http://dyn.politico.com/pdf/080222_MOPrincetonThesis_76-981.pdf Story on POLITICO Feb, 22, 2008 >>>>http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0208/8642.html Michelle Obama's Thesis >>>>http://www.snopes.com/politics/obama/thesis.asp It's one thing to be partisan about your political propensity and be irrelevant. However, to make stuff up is beyond the pale. You've done enough. Have you no sense of decency, sir, at long last? Have you left no sense of decency? Joseph N. Welch to McCarty. Just as relevant here as it was when McCarty was promoting his witch hunt. JMHO of course. If you want to go through life believing that the answer to all problems are guns, God (the Christian one), hating gays, liberals, guvmint (any kind of guvmint) then you and others like you are destined to become an impotent (only politically of course ) old (mostly white) men (as well as their women who let their men do their thinking for them) who will only have blogs like this where you can shake your fist verbally at the world as it passes you by, JMHO of course. So rant on.

content: [QUOTE]Originally posted by jdksfcret: If you want to go through life believing that the answer to all problems are guns [Huh? Can't find anyone who has written that. But facts never stop a jackass exaggeration.], God (the Christian one)[There is only one. Of ourse, there are the assorted leftist gods, such as the covetousness, greed, envy, selfishness that permeates the left.], hating gays, liberals, guvmint (any kind of guvmint) then you and others like you are destined to become an impotent [Such ideological flaccidity is all yours, we're sure. ] (only politically of course ) old (mostly white) [More hypocritical, racist, discriminatory generalizations from the left. Can't be havin' any people of color who don't think like a jackass, nosiree.]men (as well as their women who let their men do their thinking for them [another of the looney generalizations whose ignorance spills into their unfounded, simple-minded, ideological blatherings; never mind that the conservative women are far more feminine and effective in what they do than the strident screechers among the leftist feminazis.]) who will only have blogs like this where you can shake your fist verbally at the world as it passes you by [Nope, sorry to prove you wrong again, but many of us remain well-ensconced in the driving activities of the world. But your underlying fear let's us gain insight to your reason for ineffectually posting on this forum.] , JMHO of course. [No, just more of your "ranting."] Rant. . . yeah, jackass rationalizations about anything substantive that they cannot refute. By all means, if you disagree with a leftist control freak, a braying jackass, then you must "hate" the people with whom you disagree. Sho' 'nuff. Again, these shallow-minded lemmings of the ludicrous and linkisch left cannot fathom that conservatives deal in ideas, much less a matter of personalities. That's why conservative policies tend to be less subjective and more effective. And to the extent that pachyderms and jackasses ignore conservative ideas, it is obvious to all except the most perverse or oblivious that the nation is plunged into greater economic, social, and military difficulty.
